summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Veteranâ€™s Affairs Commission will hold a regular meeting on January 11, 2024, at 12:00 P.M. in the Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room, with an option for videoconference participation. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss and approve the FY 2023 Annual Report and address public comments.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order & Pledge of Allegiance  
2. Public Comments on agenda items III - VI  
3. Approval of minutes from the December 14, 2023 meeting  
4. Review and discussion of the draft FY 2023 Annual Report  
5. Vote to approve the FY 2023 Annual Report  
6. Announcements regarding the timeline for the Annual Report  

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a review of the FY 2023 Annual Report, allowing for final feedback and discussion before the vote for approval. Public comments will be welcomed on the report and other agenda items. The meeting will ensure compliance with accessibility standards, offering accommodations for those needing assistance.

**Action Items**:  
The Commission seeks approval of the meeting minutes from December 14, 2023, and a vote to approve the FY 2023 Annual Report. Additionally, public participation is encouraged, with registration required 24 hours in advance for those wishing to speak.
